subject: Baseball
Memorabilia and Souvenirs
Collectors and Collections
Museums
lead_paragraph: Gary Cypres, 69, is looking for a good home for his sports collection, which is stored in Los Angeles and whose heart and soul is the era of Willie Mays, Mickey Mantle and Duke Snider.
snippet: Gary Cypres, 69, is looking for a good home for his sports collection, which is stored in Los Angeles and whose heart and soul is the era of Willie Mays, Mickey Mantle and Duke Snider.
